input.command:
sleep 2 && curl -s -X POST http://localhost:3000/api/translate -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"text":"hello","sourceLang":"auto","targetLang":"es"}' --max-time 10 &
CURL_PID=$!
sleep 12
if kill $CURL_PID 2>/dev/null; then echo "Request timed out"; else echo "Request completed"; fi
tail -10 server.log
input.description: Test API and check server logs

state.output:
Request timed out
